preparazione: Add 50 grams of dried porcino mushrooms - previously soaked in cold water - and fry them for a while
Clean 500 grams of asparagi and cut their tips, wash them with water and add them to the sauté
Add 3 clean and finely sliced artichokes, pour in some stock and cook for 10 minutes
Add to the sauté 300 grams of shrimps and cook for about 7 minutes
Chop a chicken breast, add to the sauté and cook gently for 20 minutes
Clean 400 g of sardines and add them to the sauté. Cook for 10 minutes
Chop 150g of smoked bacon and add it to the sauté with two oil spoons.
